name: Hongsheng Zhu
body:
### Personal Data
| ---: | :--- |
| Data of birth | March 14, 1988 |
| Birth place | Wuhan, Hubei, P. R. China |
| Nationality | Chinese |

### Education
Since Sep. 2012 Combined Master/PhD Program: PhD, Institute of Particle Physics, Central China Normal University, Wuhan, P. R. China
Nov. 2013 - Nov. 2015 Joint-PhD Program, CERN, Switzerland
Feb. 2015 - Nov. 2015 Master, Department of Physics and Technology, University of Bergen, Bergen, Norway
Sep. 2010 - Jun. 2012 Combined Master/PhD Program: Master, Institute of Particle Physics, Central China Normal University, Wuhan, P. R. China
Sep. 2006 - Jun. 2010 Bachelor, College of Physical Science and Technology, Central China Normal University, Wuhan, P. R. China

### Master Thesis
Title Neutral Pion Production in p–Pb Collisions at √sNN = 5.02 TeV with ALICE PHOS at the LHC
Supervisors Dieter Röhrich, Daicui Zhou and Constantinos Loizides
Date August 31st, 2015
Mark "C"

### Bachelor Thesis
Title Study of kT Effect in Two Particle Correlation at LHC Energies
Supervisor Daicui Zhou
Date May 15th, 2010
Mark "Excellent"

### Research Activities
Data Analysis in LHC/ALICE
π0 productions in p–Pb collisions at √sNN = 5.02 TeV with ALICE PHOS detector
γ(π0) − h± correlation in pp collisions at √s = 7 TeV with ALICE PHOS and EMCal detectors

Software Development in the ALICE Offline Package – AliRoot
Analysis framework of neutral pion in p–Pb collisions

### Oral Presentations
Aug.6th 2014 “π0 production in p–Pb collisions at √sNN = 5.02 TeV with ALICE PHOton Spectrometer at the LHC”, the 5th Asian Triangle Heavy Ion Conference, Osaka, Japan
Nov.16th 2012 “Two-particle correlations with a neutral trigger in pp and Pb-Pb collisions with ALICE”, the 4th Asian Triangle Heavy Ion Conference, Pusan, South Korea

### Additional Information
Feb. 2013 - Sep. 2013 Visiting Scholar, CERN, Switzerland
Sep. 2011 - Jan. 2012 Teaching Assistant, Central China Normal University, Wuhan, P. R. China. Computer Basics for undergraduate students
Sep. 2009 - Nov. 2009 Intern, NO.1 Middle School affiliated to Central China Normal University, Wuhan, P. R. China
